name: Unlock the Game (Read the Description)
description:
POST-JAM VERSION WITH A CRUCIAL BUGFIX HERE: https://crystalclod.itch.io/unlock-the-game-with-fix


You Simply Cannot Wait for your Birthday!

Tomorrow is your birthday and you already know what you will get, the hot new thing on the playground, Kruck Buckem, the highly-praised video game for cool kids, just like you! You just cannot wait to play it, but the game is locked with... parental controls?! 

Will you be so sneaky as to search for the key before your parents wake up? 

Explore a Cool Operating System "Never Seen Before"!

Customise your JetOS interface to make your experience truly yours. There are so many cool cursors and wallpapers waiting for you.

This new computer is, of course, protected against all types of malware... It even comes with its own browser and search engine! Hey, why does this textbox keep popping up?

Controls:

Left click and keyboard.

Right click to change background.

Submitted for GMTK Game Jam
